data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ahrens, Dirk, Pacholátko, Petr (2003): New data on the distribution of species of Gastroserica Brenske, 1897, with descriptions of five new taxa from China and Laos (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Sericini). Zootaxa 342: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156757
